articles.author: Petrana Radulovic
articles.title: New Pixar movie Elio gets first alien-filled trailer
articles.description: The newest Pixar movie Elio follows a young boy who gets beamed up by aliens — giving reverse Lilo and Stitch vibes. It’s set to come out next March.

articles.description: The Super Mario Bros. Movie is out on DVD and Blu-Ray today and it includes special features, like this clip of Jack Black gushing about Bowser.
